LANGUAGE.LABEL: Credit Card Payments Processed
in file
Electronic Check Payments Processed
RECURRING PAYMENTS: Click the "Create New Payments" button to create a payment for each Sales Item that is recurring and has a due date on or before the date specified below.
Thru

PAYMENT FILES: Click the "Create Payment Files" button to create a batch file of all new payments to be processed. Click the "Mark Payments Pending" to change the status of these same payments to pending.
PAYMENT STATUS: Click the "Update Payments Status" to upload a status file for previously processed payments and update their status.

COMMISSIONS: Click the "Create Commissions" button to create the specified type of commissions for all approved payments that have not yet been commissioned and thier payment date is less than or equal to the date specified below.
PAYOUTS: Click the "Create Payouts" button to create a summary of all commissions recently created on or before the specified date for each person that has earned commissions.
For
DEBITS: Click the "Create Debits" button to create debits against unpaid payouts for recurring payments coming due within one month from the specified date below.

PAYOUT FILE: Click the "Create Payout File" button to create a payout file of all unpaid payouts with a minimum amount specified below and to be paid on the specified date below. Click the "Mark Payouts Paid" button to set the status to paid and the paid date to the specified date below for the same payouts in the payout file.

On
Set Paid Date to
